title: Shiveet khaĭrkhany
description: Burial site in western Mongolia that dates to between the 8th century BCE and the 3rd century CE. Nine tombs associated with the Pazyryk Culture and 7 tombs associated with the Xianbei Culture have been identified.

properties.description: Point representing the visible remains of complex 1 at Shiveet Khaĭrkhany, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node after Batbold 2020.
properties.title: OSM location of Shiveet khaĭrkhany
